content: > **let s stay connected ** sign up for email updates on the site 1 and receive new free knit and crochet patterns weekly exclusive coupons and free goodies you won t find anywhere else ***new email subscribers also receive a coupon for 15% off of their first order *** it s our happy positive place on the internet xoxo this pattern is free for a limited time just add to cart and complete checkout to receive the download for more info click here 2 sizes bust sizes s/m 32 38 81 97 cm l/xl 39 46 99 117 cm 2xl/3xl 48 54 122 137 cm the sample is shown in size s/m modeled on a 34 86 cm bust materials expression fiber arts alpaca silk dk 4 yarn shown in color blush brush without collar 3 4 4 skeins with collar 3 4 5 skeins if that color isn t available any from this category 5 will work needle us size ​​7 4 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge skill level intermediate - this pattern is for those who feel comfortable with knitting and have made a few projects using various skills and techniques skills/concepts include cables lace stitches joining panels and blocking notes from the designer like most knitters i take my yarn and needles wherever i go my grandchildren call it my magic bag because what i do is magical to them so i decided to name this pattern for my youngest granddaughter olivia her hebrew name is orli which means my light the poncho contains a shell stitch and a basic braided cable this pattern is easy enough for someone who has never attempted a cable stitch but engaging enough to keep the most seasoned knitter interested * click here 6 to watch a tutorial on how to make the cables featured in this shawl * the total yardage for sizes **without** the collar s/m 550 yds 503 m l/xl 785 yds 718 m and 2xl/3xl 890 yds 814 m * the total yardage for sizes **with** the collar s/m 650 yds 594 m l/xl 900 yds 823 m and 2xl/ 3xl 1 020 yds 933 m * each blocked panel size width x length s/m 15 38 cm x 28 71 cm l/xl 17 43 cm x 32 81cm and 2xl/3xl 19 48 cm x 36 91 cm * it is recommended that you knit a swatch and block it to check gauge as the yarn and stitches are stretchy * it is recommended to use either a solid or tonal colors the cable stitch gets lost with variegated yarn *designed by patricia liefeld* you ll receive a digital file only instantly downloadable as a pdf and won t be shipped anything please allow a few minutes for the download link to be emailed to you if the email doesn t arrive within a few minutes just log into your account on our site and you ll see your completed orders from there
